TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ServiceManager extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Type>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IServiceProvider

Docs.summary: Implements <xref:System.IserviceProvider> and provides access to services offered by the editing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services%2A> represent functionality that is either provided by the host for the designer to use or that is used by the designer to make functionality available to all designers within the editor. It is obtained from the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services%2A> property.

Docs.param: The type of service to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the requested service. This method returns if the service could not be located.
Docs.returns: Returns <xref:System.Object>, which is an instance of the service, or if the service has not been published.

protected static object GetTarget (Delegate callback);
.method familystatic hidebysig object GetTarget(class System.Delegate callback) cil managed

Docs.param: The delegate to get the target for.
Docs.summary: A helper method that returns the target object for a delegate. If the delegate was created to proxy a generic delegate, this will correctly return the original object, not the proxy.
Docs.returns: Returns <xref:System.Object>, which is the callback target. This can return if the callback represents a static object.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Publish (Type serviceType, System.Activities.Presentation.PublishServiceCallback callback);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Publish(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Activities.Presentation.PublishServiceCallback callback) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of service to publish.
A callback that will be invoked when an instance of the service is needed.
Docs.summary: Publishes the specified service type, but does not declare an instance. When the service is requested, the Publish service callback will be invoked to create the instance. The callback is invoked only once. After that, the instance it returned is cached.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Publish (Type serviceType, object serviceInstance);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Publish(class System.Type serviceType, object serviceInstance) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of service to publish.
Docs.summary: Publishes the given service. After it is published, the service instance remains in the service manager until the editing context is disposed of.
Docs.exception: does not derive from or implement , or has already been published.

Docs.param: The existing delegate to remove the callback from.
Docs.summary: A helper method that performs a operation, and unwraps delegates that are proxies to generic callbacks. You should use this method in your <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager.UnSubscribe%2A> implementations.
Docs.returns: Returns <xref:System.Delegate>, which is a new value to assign to the existing delegate.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Subscribe (Type serviceType, System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeServiceCallback callback);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Subscribe(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeServiceCallback callback) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of service to subscribe to.
A callback that will be notified when the service is available.
Docs.summary: Invokes the provided callback when someone has published the requested service. If the service was already available, this method invokes the callback immediately.
